summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Sh.F.M.U. 'Rexhep Elmazi' school website with Albanian content, admin dashboard, and Live TV functionality. All core features working correctly.

design_issues.issue: Yellow color elements not detected in automated testing - may need manual verification

passed_tests: All 20 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
All CRUD operations for Student of Month, Top Students, Activities, Tournaments, Announcements
Home page loads with Albanian content (Mirësevini në Shkollën 'Rexhep Elmazi')
Student of Month section displays correctly with photo and details
Activities and Tournaments sections show sample data
Navigation works to all pages (nxenesi-i-muajit, nxenesit-me-te-mire, aktivitetet, turniret, rreth, kontakt)
Admin dashboard login and logout functionality
Admin dashboard tab navigation (5 tabs working)
Live TV dashboard auto-rotation every 8-10 seconds between 3 sections
Live TV displays current time and date updating correctly
Announcements marquee scrolling with Albanian text
Contact page with Google Maps embed
Mobile responsive design with menu button
All Albanian language content displays correctly
